turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Shu (state).
turn.1: When was the Qin dynasty able to defeat the Zhou dynasty?
turn.2: In 314 BC the late Kaiming king's son was appointed Marquis Yaotong of Shu to rule in conjunction with a Qin governor.
turn.3: Did the founder of Shu get along with the founder of Qin?
turn.4: In 311 BC an official named Chen Zhuang revolted and killed Yaotong.
turn.6: Sima Cuo and Zhang Yi again invaded Sichuan and killed Chen Zhuang.
turn.8: Another Kaiming called Hui was made Marquis.
turn.10: In 301 BC he was involved in an intrigue and chose suicide when confronted with Sima Cuo's army.
turn.11: Who took over after Hui's death?
turn.12: His son, Wan, the last Kaiming marquis, reigned from 300 until 285 BC when he was put to death.
